PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08462022-06-23,  ,  ,  TC,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
PrecisAppointment of MARTIN RODOLPHE LANDRY of Montréal, Quebec, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months or until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Appointment of MARTIN RODOLPHE LANDRY of Montréal, Quebec, to be President and Chief Executive Officer of VIA Rail Canada Inc., on an interim basis, to hold office during pleasure for a term of eighteen months or until such time as a new President and Chief Executive Officer is appointed, whichever occurs first.
